verbs.description: Why [V: would] Donald Trump place a dangerous bet on a new foreign policy towards Israel ? The religious right 's theological vision had something to do with it .
Why would Donald Trump place a dangerous bet on a new foreign policy towards Israel ? [ARG0: The religious right 's theological vision] [V: had] [ARG1: something to do with it] .
Why would Donald Trump place a dangerous bet on a new foreign policy towards Israel ? The religious right 's theological vision had [ARG2: something] to [V: do] [ARG1: with it] .
